989280.name: MarineVerse's Sailboat Racing Training
989280.description:
Work on and improve your sailboat racing performance in virtual reality to get better results in real life.

Tell me and I will forget, show me and I may remember; involve me and I will understand.Confucius

Training modules

  • Practice adjusting various sail controls, including cunningham and the boom vang to get the best speed depending on conditions
  • Learn and practice international racing rules
  • Practice race starts
  • Practice rounding marks with other boats "in the way"
  • and more based on community feedback and ideas

From creators of VR Regatta


In 2016 MarineVerse released the first virtual reality sailing experience available on Steam - VR Regatta. Initially released as Early Access, VR Regatta evolved to be a well received, unique experience gently introducing countless gamers to the world of virtual reality sailing.

While developing VR Regatta, we made many design decisions making the game accessible to non-sailors. With Sailboat Racing Training ( SRT ), we are focusing exclusively on sailors interested in improving their real life racing performance. With this laser focus, we will be making design choices to create a truly useful tool that will help you get better at racing!
